title: What it this family crest(Coat of arms)
content:
Anyone know about this family crest(Coat of arms). I need clear image to vectorized it

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110203052436im_/http:/typophile.com/files/11360588_5320.jpg)
author: artslons

comments.content: I wish I offer some help, but you're looking for answers in the wrong place.
If you can read the motto (the phrase, probably in Latin, on the banner at the bottom) from your source, please post it and I'll take a crack at it.

The Coat of Arms of Trinidad and Tobago was designed by a committee formed in 1962 to select the symbols that would be representative of the people of Trinidad and Tobago. The committee included noted artist Carlyle Chang and designer the late George Bailey.

[http://www.nalis.gov.tt/Independence/NatSymbols.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20110203052436/http:/www.nalis.gov.tt/Independence/NatSymbols.htm "http://www.nalis.gov.tt/Independence/NatSymbols.htm")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110203052436im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Coat_of_arms_Trinidad_and_Tobago_4857.jpg)
  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Personal Art and Design Portal of Ivan Gulkov  
 [www.ivangdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20110203052436/http:/www.ivangdesign.com/ "www.ivangdesign.com")
Google says it's the coat of arms of Trinidad & Tobago.
Thank yoo so much for great help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :)
